entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Estevan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 p.m. CST Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and after midnight. Blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northeast 20 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 8:18 PM CST Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of snow. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:18 PM CST Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 8:18 PM CST Wednesday 19 April 2023
